title: MAKE IT OR BREAK IT
description:
Warm Up. 8 Minutes:
  • Easy warm up jog
Main Set. 19 Minutes:
  • 1 minute fast effort in Zone 5 ZONE_5_PACING
  • 1 minute easy
  • 2 minutes fast effort in Zone 5 ZONE_5_PACING
  • 1 minute easy
  • 3 minutes fast effort in Zone 5 ZONE_5_PACING
  • 1 minute easy
  • 4 minutes fast effort in Zone 5 ZONE_5_PACING
  • 1 minute easy
  • 5 minutes fast effort in Zone 5 ZONE_5_PACING
Cool Down. 3 Minutes:
  • Easy running to cool down
description_sharing: A MOTTIV App run workout designed to develop Vo2 Max.
workout_nutrition:
Pre-workout: 30-40g of carbs.

During Workout: light electrolyte drink with less than 40 calories.

Get $80 annually towards nutrition products here at TheFeed.com
structured_run: WU 8:00 ZONE_2_HR,A 1:00 ZONE_5_PACING,R 1:00 ZONE_1_RPE,A 2:00 ZONE_5_PACING,R 1:00 ZONE_1_RPE,A 3:00 ZONE_5_PACING,R 1:00 ZONE_1_RPE,A 4:00 ZONE_5_PACING,R 1:00 ZONE_1_RPE,A 5:00 ZONE_5_PACING,CD 3:00 ZONE_2_PACING

title: THE BUBBLE
description:
Warm Up:
  • 8 minutes gradually building effort and heart rate ZONE_2_HR.
  • 2 minutes easy spin ZONE_1_RPE
Main Set. Repeat 2 times:
  • 4 minutes Zone 4 ZONE_4_POWER
  • 1 minute easy spin
  • 3 minutes Zone 5 ZONE_5_POWER
  • 2 minutes easy spin
Cool Down.
  • 1 minute easy spinning
description_sharing: A MOTTIV App bike workout designed to develop Vo2 Max.
workout_nutrition:
Pre-workout: 30-40g of carbs.

During Workout: light electrolyte drink with less than 40 calories.

title: THE DOCTOR
description:
Warm Up. 10 Minutes:
  • Build up from easy effort until heart rate reaches Zone 2 heart rate ZONE_2_HR
Main Set. Repeat 5 times:
  • 4.5 minutes at strong Zone 4 effort ZONE_4_POWER
  • 3.5 minutes easy spin
Cool Down. 5 Minutes:
  • Easy spinning ZONE_1_RPE
description_sharing: A MOTTIV App bike workout designed to develop Vo2 Max.

title: IT BURNS
description:
Warm Up. 15 Minutes:
  • 10 minute easy jog warm up ZONE_2_HR.
  • 5 minutes of dynamic stretching and 5x50m strides building to Zone 4 ZONE_4_RPE
Main Set. Repeat 9 times:
  • 2 minutes at fast effort in Zone 5 ZONE_5_PACING
  • 2 minutes easy jog rest between
Cool Down. 5 Minutes:
  • Easy cool down jog ZONE_2_PACING
description_sharing: A MOTTIV App run workout designed to adapt to Vo2 max running.
workout_nutrition:
Pre-workout: 30-40g of carbs.
